title: Kylie Jenner is accepting pregnancy stretch marks
text:
Kylie Jenner is learning to accept the stretch marks on her body from being pregnant.

The 22-year-old is mum to daughter Stormi, one, and has said that she was left with stretch marks across her boobs and bum from when she was expecting.

But, instead of trying to banish such marks, Kylie refreshingly told fans she is ‘accepting’ them instead, as they’re a little ‘gift’ from her baby girl.

The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star took part in a Q&A on Instagram and was asked whether she had managed to get rid of the scarring.

Kylie replied: ‘[Had stretch marks] on my breasts, butt and thighs! I haven’t gotten rid of them. Just accepted them as a little gift from Stormi lol.’

She was also asked whether it had been hard getting back into shape after giving birth and Kylie confessed: ‘I snapped back pretty fast.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

Although, she did admit her body (although, still very much fire) isn’t the same after being pregnant.

‘It was never the same and still isn’t,’ she said. ‘Once I accepted the change my confidence came back, it just takes time.’

Kylie shares daughter Stormi with ex Travis Scott (Picture: Instagram)

Kylie shares Stormi with ex-boyfriend Travis Scott. The pair recently called time on their three-year relationship, shocking fans who thought they were going to get married.

They continue to co-parent Stormi, however, with rapper Travis saying fatherhood is the ‘most impactful thing’ on his life.

‘Stormi is like a battery. I’ve gotten so much energy from her,’ he said. ‘She has shown me so many things that I never understood. I only got it once she was here.’

Kylie, meanwhile, has said she wants more kids in the future. She said she ‘can’t wait’ to have more babies in the future, but isn’t quite ready to expand her family just yet.

description: Kylie Jenner reveals she was left with stretch marks on her breasts, butt and thighs following pregnancy.
